instructions: To add a new vertex, click on the 'Add' button and then click on the canvas.
To connect vertices, click on the 'Connect' button and drag the edge from one vertex to another.
To remove a vertex/edge, click on the 'Remove' button and left click on the vertex/edge you want to remove.
To clear the canvas, you can click on 'Clear' button.
By clicking the 'Export' button you can save the canvas in png format.
